title: #24: Incoming!!!! | Shepard Ambellas
description:
We sit down with the founder of Intellihub, Shepard Ambellas, to discuss the very real cosmic threats to our planet that are due to comets moving through our region of space.

As if 2020 wasn’t bad enough already, we can add planetary destruction due to icy space rocks to the list of things that we might want to be aware of. This isn’t some blind projection or fear-mongering, there is actual science to back up Shepard’s claims that these orbits are intersecting in the very near future.

Could this explain the massive overreaction by governments around the world to try and keep everyone indoors, or is the virus situation just a coincidence? Let’s listen to what Shepard Ambellas thinks and we can decide for ourselves.
